arts.ttl: IShowSpeed net worth, meeting Cristiano Ronaldo and KSI boxing 'fight'
arts.sum: American streamer IShowSpeed is set to play in the latest iteration of the Sidemen Charity Match at Wembley Stadium on Saturday afternoon having seen his following balloon over recent years

arts.ttl: What happened to the 5 players Ronaldo said would become world's best - with CR7 snubbed
arts.sum: He was afraid of nobody on the pitch but Brazilian World Cup winner Ronaldo proved he is also fearless off it when he snubbed Cristiano Ronaldo

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo jokingly disrespects lookalike fan who traveled to watch him
arts.sum: Despite the lighthearted pre-match moment, Ronaldo remained focused on delivering results for his team. Ahead of Friday night's Saudi Pro League clash against Al-Shabab, Ronaldo spotted the man in the crowd-dressed in a Portugal jersey and sporting the same hairstyle as the Al-Nassr superstar.

arts.ttl: Brutal moment Cristiano Ronaldo tells lookalike fan he is 'very UGLY' during awkward encounter before Saudi Arabia game
arts.sum: Al-Nassr are pushing to finish in the AFC Champions League spots for next season, but are in danger of missing out after they dropped points at home to Al-Shabab - despite Ronaldo scoring.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo attacks ‘lookalike’ in Saudi Arabia: “You’re very ugly!”
arts.sum: Ronaldo jogged over in his general direction and went on the offensive: “Bro, you don’t look like me. Cristiano Ronaldo has never lacked self confidence, which his ‘lookalike’ found out the hard way ahead of Al Nassr’s Saudi Pro League game against Al Shabab on Friday.

arts.ttl: ‘Cristiano Ronaldo Almost Made Me Quit Real Madrid - Then We Won 4 UCLs Together’
arts.sum: Marcelo has revealed why he almost left Real Madrid when he found out that Cristiano Ronaldo was joining the club

arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim has endured a tricky few months since taking charge, and fresh reports of further issues have begun to come to the fore
